thread.title: BRIEF-Global Payments Units Entered Into First Refinancing Amendment To Co's Second Restated Credit Agreement

title: BRIEF-Global Payments Units Entered Into First Refinancing Amendment To Co's Second Restated Credit Agreement

organizations.name: second restated credit agreement reuters staff

text: March 20, 2018 / 8:55 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Global Payments Units Entered Into First Refinancing Amendment To Co's Second Restated Credit Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Global Payments Inc: * GLOBAL PAYMENTS - ‍ON MARCH 20, CO, UNITS ENTERED INTO FIRST REFINANCING AMENDMENT TO CO’S SECOND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED JULY 31, 2015 * GLOBAL PAYMENTS - AS PER REFINANCING AMENDMENT, INTEREST RATE OF TERM B-2 LOANS CONSTITUTING EUROCURRENCY LOANS IS A BASE RATE PLUS 1.75% - SEC FILING​ * GLOBAL PAYMENTS - ‍AS PER REFINANCING AMENDMENT, INTEREST RATE OF TERM B-2 LOANS CONSTITUTING BASE RATE LOANS IS A BASE RATE PLUS 0.75%​ Source text: [ bit.ly/2pvhyXo ] Further company coverage:
